channel.title: [317]Error connecting to server
channel.description: Ok, so I am running of ZeroScape source + client which seems to be going very well except no one can log on with the client. I have used a byte searcher and searched the whole client for 0.0.0.0, 127.0.0.1 and anything with no-ip and the only thing I can see to edit it is config.dat where it has 123noobscape321.servegame.com and many more ip adresses (e.g 123noobscape.servebeer.com, 123noobscape.no-ip.org) is this the file I should be changing to set my ip adress onto the clients? I have looked up heaps of tutorials and none seem to be able to help so maybe someone could help? Thanks

item.title: [317]Error connecting to server
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

the 3 most popular files that contain the server ip the client connects to is:

client.java
gui.java
EGUI.java

just search “server ip” in any of those and see if it brings you to anything.

Read full topic

item.title: [317]Error connecting to server
item.dc:creator: @Phaze_One Fuscate
item.description:
@Phaze_One wrote:

Ok, so I am running of ZeroScape source + client which seems to be going very well except no one can log on with the client. I have used a byte searcher and searched the whole client for 0.0.0.0, 127.0.0.1 and anything with no-ip and the only thing I can see to edit it is config.dat where it has 123noobscape321.servegame.com and many more ip adresses (e.g 123noobscape.servebeer.com, 123noobscape.no-ip.org) is this the file I should be changing to set my ip adress onto the clients? I have looked up heaps of tutorials and none seem to be able to help so maybe someone could help? Thanks
